caption: In this times and days, it is the exception to find a place that delivers on your expectations. You search, read ratings and reviews, watch the pictures and fall in love with your dreamy expectations about the place you haven't been yet and …

Luce is our Bi Weekly go to restaurant. The food is absolutely amazing and is expertly prepared each and every time. (Even when I have special request the Chef never fails). It is a relaxing atmosphere where the staff gets to know you and is always attentive. Wish I could give Luce 10/10

March 27, 2021  To the owner of  Luce I am sad that my children had to come to your establishment to be disrespected and if their money was not good enough to spend.  The first impression is always ones last impression.  I will expose your …
Always have a great meal....management staff excellent and friendly! Love this restaurant... manager takes great care of everyone. Will be back!
Poor service , the food was horrible , servers were disrespectful and rude, and there was a manager taking shots at the bar on the job.

Dear Luce Management & Staff; I wanted to share my most satisfactory review.  Three of my girlfriends and I had dinner at your fine restaurant on Friday, March 12th.  We were celebrating Elizabeth’s successful completion of radiation …
So far the experience is not well, the sprite was brought in a can , the tea was terrible and service is not 4.1.

Happy Birthday at Luce! What an incredible dining experience. Where to start? How about  fried calamari and zucchini sticks for appetizer? Delicious and the marinara sauce was the best. Then seafood pasta or the famous rigatoni buttera? A …
Food was great service was fast

Top class Italian restaurant in uptown the vibe is very formal and professional so you want to dress your best . Also , book a reservation. The food is fantastic. I had well done Salmon with asparagus and spinach . I loved it . One of the …

Absolutely amazing!  I had the fish of the night which included salmon, scallops and a white fish.  Party on my palette!!  Best assortment I’ve ever had in my life.  Vibe and staff were so friendly and welcoming.  I’d highly recommend this place for any special event or even just a fun date night.  🥂
The best food,the best restaurant

My husband and I had a wonderful evening celebrating three years together. They treated us with some lovely rose to celebrate. The staff was playful yet efficient and very friendly. The food was unlike anything we've tried before--authentic and incredibly high quality. The ambience was pleasant and it was truly a night to remember!
Luce was a great taste of authentic italian. The drinks were phenomenal as well. Definitely recommend checking out the coffee and desert at the end.
The food, management and staff are top notch

The food was flavorful! The service was 5 stars. I love how attentive the servers  were and I truly can’t wait to go back. It’s a must try “LUCE” on the list of my favorite restaurants. The host/manager/server he is everything will make your experience.
The food was incredible! The service was spectacular. I love how attentive the servers were and I truly can’t wait to go back.

Chose this location for dinner for our only night in Charlotte and it was amazing. Fantastic food, great ambiance, and the owner and staff were as pleasant and helpful as possible. Highly recommend visiting this restaurant during your time to Charlotte.

Found this restaurant at the last minute due to everything being booked! Me and my husband just eloped and had a WONDERFUL experience!!! The food was amazing and they even gave us this extremely delicious dessert on the house!!! Overall I definitely would recommend!!! Lovely atmosphere. Romantic. It was just a PERFECT EXPERIENCE!!

Visited Luce’s for a birthday, and the waitresses and owner were VERY welcoming. Everyone was friendly and helpful. The owner is amazing and the food and drinks were great! You should visit if in town
italian food and the feeling here is excellent. Filled me up in no time. Looking forward to a return visit.
This place is amazing.  Everyone is so friendly and attentive, and the food is amazing.  I can't wait to come back!
Food was not to my liking. Customer service was great!!

My (now) wife have been coming here for the last ten years. It is our favorite restaurant in all of Charlotte. Everything on the menu is fantastic. Ask for Manuel or Rosie, but everyone here is top notch and always give A++ customer service.
We visited in March 2020 before the crazy lockdown and absolutely loved it. The food, service and owner is outstanding.

The worst restaurant experience we've ever had. Food was OK but I was about to lose my mind because of the hall service. This old lady waitress was just too rude and the hall service chief is just too careless for his unhappy customer.
One of my fav spots for tasty Italian food. Visited on a Wednesday I think. The staff was very kind and attentive. The bill was good for how much you get.
Nice spot for Italian food. Very appetizing. Looking forward to coming back with my relatives. The bill was good for what you get.
Nice place for Italian food. i will be back with my coworkers. the bill was appropriate.

Italian food and the scene here is quality. service is always awesome even when they have a full house. i had a brother come into town and he asked me to go back here. bring your appetite because portions are large.
One of my top locations for delicious Italian food. it was so delicious. the place has a great atmosphere.
Nice location for tasty italian food. bring your hunger - portions are generous.
My favorite location for italian food. service is typically great. it has a nice interior. this place has good reviews for a reason.

Amazing customer service!!! We went here for an anniversary and they even had a little card set up! BEST chicken Parmesan in CLT! The only bad thing is of course the portion but it’s a high end restaurant so what can you expect! Everything was really good no complains
We got beef carpaccio for an appetizer...fantastic! The veal piccata was superb and the waiter made excellent wine recommendations. We will definitely go back!

Wonderful food, friendly staff, beautiful decor. The size of the plates are small per the amount but hands down the best Italian in Charlotte. Thank you for the amazing Valentine’s Day celebration for my girlfriend and I.

We have been here several times in the past and usually had good experiences. My wife is a big fan and it was her birthday celebration so we came here with a group of 8 people. Two of us arrived 10 minutes early and sat at the table. We …
The food and location is Awesome for a girls night or date night
Excellent dining.  Fine people. Relaxing place. Affordable
Great place to have lunch. Good atmosphere for business or personal meal and the service and food are awesome!
Manager was amazing he was walking by and we asked him a question next thing we know he took our order and suggested a combination not on menu
Amazing everything amazing

Chicken park was excellent, thin, lean and nicely breaded with fresh mozzarella. Caprese appetizer was disappointing, the tomatoes were green and tough. Not good. Service was good, overall a good experience.
Excellent Italian. Cacio e Pepe was very good and Osso Buco was second only to my wife's!  Impeccable service too. Grazie tante
It's really good, the food is great. Service doesnt mean the cost level though.
Great maitre d, welcoming and pleasant.

Very disappointed in this evening. Picked Luce to host a large table of visitors to Charlotte. Uses reviews and location to choose it. Yes I understand it was NYE but then (1) hire more staff and/or (2) set expectations with the table. We …
Great service, food was ok. Had a few bones in my sea bass, another guest had some muscles that were unsavory. Great house can tho!
Delicious food excellent service
Very friendly service. Chicken Parmesan was very good! Side potatoes are excellent! Quiet atmosphere for a nice meal. If you want quality Italian, you come here. 10 / 10
Excellent service and great ambiance. Most restaurants are too loud, that was not the case here. Intimate setting. The food was fresh and delicious. I’m glad we tried this restaurant.
As always, fabulous!
Our favorite Uptown restaurant. Great food and service!

I'm all about personal service - feeling like at home and food quality They were very accommodating for a large bday party  we had , the food was excellent and the service was outstanding . They close at 10pm but they allowed us to stay way …
Amazing experience! Food is delicious along with spectacular service that accommodated our party of twenty. Thank you!
Best Italian food we have ever had and we have been to Italy a few times.
Classic

We went here for our anniversary dinner, per all the great reviews, and were a little disappointed. The food and service was great, but the portions were much smaller than expected. I was hoping for a little bit more food for a $30 dish, but guess that's the price you pay for the atmosphere.

Deliciously handcrafted pasta (Cavatelli with meatballs) served in a quiet atmosphere. Lunch can be a bit pricey but so worth it for the excellent personal service and quality of their food. Large patio area to enjoy the fall weather as well!
Owner is super fun to talk to, really expensive but really great.
Service and Food.. ALWAYS GREAT 👍
Good ambience, flavorful food.
Small intimate setting. Good food and service...just kinda on the pricey side

I had never been to Luce so was a little nervous to make a reservation for 10 people without any prior experience, but thought you really couldn't go wrong with Italian right? Oh Luce knows how to do it!A couple of us arrived and went to the bar before the rest of our guests arrived.
Great maitre d, welcoming and pleasant. The food was good and the atmosphere was lovely. The wait staff was attentive and I will visit again.
Extraordinary service!

We ate here for the third time and were surprised at the excellent meals and service. As I have to eat gluten free now, I was a little anxious how it would go. The GF starter of octopus, the GF seafood penne pasta were all excellent! And so …
Delicious!
One of the best Italian Restaurant the I try in us . The Branzino fish was absolutely great . Service is very good . Price also is really good in comparison of the food quality . Strongly suggested .
MUST VISIT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Listen, I ate one of their foods and it tasted GREAT! I am willing to come back agian!
Pretty good place to eat. Wife loved the sea food platter. I tried the ravioli and it was decent. Wish the plate contained more food however. Was a bit hard to find for a traveler.
Wouldn't even give them this rating small portions for the price the food wasn't good at all
Our server (Manuel) was a lot of fun! Amazing food!
Amazing food and even better service!

To be honest there was nothing you could complain about this restaurant, the staff and the fabulous meal. It was our anniversary dinner and they had a little extra (dessert) for us as well as the great meal. The wine list is very good, our …
Excellent good and service. Later night visit for dessert and drinks. Staff was attentive and as usual desserts were outstanding.
italian food and the atmosphere at this spot is excellent. it's so appetizing. next time i'll be back with my coworkers. prices were fair for the quality of the food.
Great food!
Very nice restaurant. Service and food are both excellent.

Service was great. The atmosphere is very elegant and romantic. We went to celebrate our anniversary. The staff was very welcoming. I had the Pollo Parma and it was delicious! We will definitely return.
Great service and food
It nice
Service is outstanding here! Will definitely return; helpful and friendly staff who made our night more enjoyable than most restaurants.
Great Italian food! I like the patio as well
Just nice!
A preferred place for quality italian food. Certainly a top place in the area. Service is typically above par. The bill was good for how much you get. This place has positive reviews for a reason.
Excellent service. The Mare was excellent for all you seafood lovers.
Excellent food selection. Great service.
Service and food were fantastic!
beyond great food, and had a great time while i was here.
Italian food and service at this spot is very good. service is consistently above par. prices are appropriate. this place has many reviews for a reason.

Best Italian in town! I’ve been going to Luce for years. Food is fantastic and friendly service to match. Everyone works as a team and makes you feel special. Can’t say enough good things about Luce. Highly recommend.
Awesome. Great. fantastic. House made pasta! Service got us to ACC tourney in time.
Excellent food at this venerable Italian kitchen. Very good service. Decor also impeccable.
First class dining and service.  Only place I've found a veal chop on the menu in 2.5 yrs!

My girlfriend and I visited Luce to enjoy a meal and it was absolutely exquisite. The customer service was on point, the wine was delicious, the appetizers were tasty and the Mare pasta was to die for. If you're thinking about visiting and are not allergic to seafood, order the Mare, it will not disappoint.
Some of the better high end dining but does not impress on a non-local scale
Great food, easy to get a reservation.   Little pricey but worth it.

Had a reservation but still took a while to get seated. Other than that it was a great experience. Both mine and my wifes meals were delicous and the servers were very polite and attentive.. also gave us conplimentary wine for our anniversary!!
My wife and I had an amazing dinner experience. The food was exquisite and cooked with skill. The staff was elegant and accommodating.
One of our go-to spots. Always delicious with exceptional service.
Food was great and so was service. Very cozy, we came here for restaurant week and it definitely met our expectations.

The absolute worst customer service known on this Earth. What started as my friend quietly bringing up her concerns quickly became the manager shouting at her and pretty much telling us to leave. She didn't even get more than a few …
Food was very good but the portions are not very generous for the price.
Excelent I love luce
Excellent food, medium service, great vegetarian options.
I don't venture uptown for much, but I will for Luce!

I attended this restaurant for my best friends' birthday. Although the decor is beautiful, the staff was not the most welcoming. We had a large party of about 12-14 people, and they did not seem prepared to handle it; orders were incorrect, …
This place is awesone and a must if you're looking for great Italian in downtown Charlotte. Service is top notch as well...👍👍👍
I love this restaurant. I enjoy it every time i'm in Charlotte. The food and service are impeccable and it seems to get better and better every time I eat here.
Great food great service . Cesar gives really amazing service makes you feel very welcomed. I would say one of the top 10 best restaurants in all the city . Great Italian food.
Food/atmosphere are excellent; service is friendly and extremely attentive
Best Italian that my wife and I have found so far in charlotte.  Intimate setting, romantic, and fair priced.
Food was delicious, served fast and the team there was very courteous
Good food, fast service and nice team
Pleasant experience Highly recommend

Went here for dinner before a theater show. The service was great, location is pretty convenient, but the food was not outstanding. For the money, there are certainly other nearby Italian restaurants that outperform for less. I might give it a second chance, but overall I was a little let down.
Consistently "the best" Italian restaurant...
Exactly what I expected.  Perfection

This negative review is specifically for the manager on duty tonight. After our party of eight was seated, it took the server about 10 minutes to bring over the menus and another 10 minutes went by and no one had asked us if we would like …

My 36th birthday dinner was at Luce restaurant and bar uptown, and It was an amazing experience. It was a nice quiet elegant atmosphere. Staff was extremely helpful and attentive to our table. Food and service was magnificent🤗🤗🤗
Expensive, and the food had too much nutmeg or some random spice.

We had dinner in this restaurant and enjoyed every minute of it. From the moment you enter, you feel welcome. The restaurant was not so noisy as previous restaurants we visited in the same class. The food was excellent and served with flair. We hope to visit this restaurant again in the future.
Fantastic service, great place for a business meal.
Always a great meal here.  Attentive service, lovely atmosphere and great food.  The Mare seafood pasta was incredible.

This restaurant is a little hard to find but I rate this place only a 3 because the service was not friendly or showed any hospitality, and the food was just decent. Nothing stood out for me for taste wise and they put about 4 pieces of  calamari  On the appetizer smh.

What a wonderful experience. It's hard enough to find an authentic Italian restaurant in Charlotte with great food and ambiance. But it's the superior attention one gets from the friendly and helpful wait staff that makes this a truly …
Great place

Where do I even start?? The whole experience was PHENOMENAL! The wait staff was attentive, and made spectacular recommendations. The food was divine, and the tiramisu was EXCELLENT! This will be our new date night spot! Highly Recommended.

Celebrating our anniversary and my husband picked a perfect Italian restaurant. They started us off with a complimentary glass of champagne. For an appetizer, we had brushetta. I had  veal piccata and my husband had a seafood dish. Everything was absolutely delicious. We will be returning. There are more items we'd like to try.

Fantastic small Italian restaurant with a great lively atmosphere and excellent food.  The staff is friendly and really helpful.  They took great care of my 6 year old even though she is super picky.  I will come back again.
Awesome food, horribly rude service
Lovely
The food and service were wonderful. Authentic Italian food at its finest. Yum!
Authentic, upscale, and deeelicious!💓

This is a good place to get together with friends or a romantic dinner, but be prepared to pay an arm and leg. Disappointed that my Veal Chop wasn't prepared how I ordered, but still tasted ok even though it was well done. I had to eat my …

Amazing experience on a lovely outdoor patio - even after a difficult experience getting to the restaurant, the staff absolutely saved us and provided attentive service and delicious food all evening. Brought our small dog and everyone was …
Excellent food and service.

Loved the ambience... our waiter was very friendly and took good care of us.. in the end since he got to know its my birthday he brought us lemon liqueur... that was on the house... Loved the shrimp salad and halibut special... chocolate cake was simply delicious...
Very good Italian food and the service was extremely friendly and helpful.

It is a famous Italian restaurant in Charlotte. The atmosphere of the restrant is good, the staff is very good. You can enjoy authentic Italian cuisine. When I go to Charlotte, I definitely want to go to a restaurant.
Had b-day lunch here, VERY elegant atmosphere...first class service...excellent everything...perfect place for a romantic date
Fabulous Italian restaurant.  Hand made pasta and great environment.  They do have some gluten free options

Made reservations and asked for a romantic table for 2 and was sat right beside the bathroom. Ordered the Lasagna which tasted like chili cheese nachos. Very beautiful inside but thats just about it. Very disappointed.
Excellent service and food
Amazing authentic Italian restaurant with remarkable wine list. Very attentive staff.
This is geniune Italian cuisine!  I highly recommend.
Amazing authentic Italian cuisine.. Excellent service, wine and staff.

My 2nd time for lunch! The manager is so helpful & very attentive. The food is amazing & you can tell its authentic Italian. The servers are very friendly & you notice their teamwork right away! This is how every restaurant should be ran!!
Wonderful experience, have already sent friends and there furry friends.
Good food, upscale, lively decor, attentive waiter. Nice.
Great ambience, service, wine and food!
Food was nothing special. Very bland. The prefix menu is terrible do not order. I won't give this place a 2nd change there's too many great restaurants in the area.
Excellent service and the dishes are amazing!
Delicious! We had a party of 11 and was cared for to the highest level.

Good Italian food...staff is very friendly...prices are reasonable and food is tasty...place is well maintained...they have good menu for wine.... perfect place for dinner with family and friends..loved the ravioli which I tried here
Really liked it.  Excellent service. Found staff to be helpful and professional.
I love the Raviolis! Service is super nice! The beens they serve while waiting the food are so delicious :) I heard that cheescake is amazing.

Best Italian restaurant in Charlotte hands down!  the service is the best I've ever experienced and the food is always amazing.  We come here for every date night and anniversary.  My family from NY and MA still rave about this place!
Probably the best restaurant in Charlotte but still doesn't compare well to great Italian spots in Boston or New York.
Excellent upscale Italian dining!  The service is attentive and the atmosphere is exquisite. A great place for a romantic meal!
Wonderful food. Service was professional and knowledgeable. Would definitely recommend
This is my favorite restaurant in Charlotte. My wedding rehearsal and every date night since!

I absolutely love this restaurant! Their service was nice plus the food was very tasty! It was my birthday and we arrived late for our scheduled reservation and the restaurant was going to be closing in less than 30 minutes. The maitre d …
My meal was amazing and the atmosphere is beautiful.
The best Italian in the Uptown area!
The food is wonderful, and you couldn't ask for better service. They were even able to accommodate my dietary constraints.

The atmosphere and food were FANTASTIC. The food was the best I have ever had in my life, the servers were very attentive, but we reserved a table for 8 pm weeks before and were not seated until almost 9 pm.

I came to this establishment for Restaurant Week 2017 and I can honestly say, this was the WORST restaurant experience I've ever had in my 28 years of life. This was our first time at this particular restaurant, so of course we had …

My 2 friends and I went to this establishment for restaurant week. The service was horrible! We didn't even get to taste the food the manager was really rude as well when we brought it to his Attention how rude the server was. This was my first and LAST time coming to this place!
Osso Bucco, Need I say more?
Phenomenal.
Delicious Italian food! A little salty though. Owner is delightful and has done a wonderful job making the place feel comfortably romantic!
So amazing-- actually comparable to the pasta dishes I had while in Italy. Rich and full of flavor. Ambiance is great with authentic feel and attentive service
Food is simply amazing. Everything is good. Great service. Place can be a bit loud - price of being so popular. I keep going back!
Great food, excellent service. The recommended wine given our price point, both red and white, made the evening special.
Fantastic food
Great meal with opera Carolina.
amazingggg pizza
Great atmosphere and even better food.
The Maine crab ravioli was the best crab dish I have ever eaten! Te carpaccio was delicious. The bartender was friendly. The bar crowd was covivial. A great evening with my baby!
Good Italian food, great place to go for business dinners

Food was really great.  Management are very involved and very nice. Waitress accidentally had a mishap and a glass fell on me,  unintentionally,  as I sat close to kitchen exit but I relocated. And still enjoyed the food with my wife. I will definitely go back there to eat.
Amazing Italian food. Beautiful decor, friendly staff and not over priced

Authentic Italian flavor in a formal environment. The entry to luce is a little off the beaten path, if you're not coming in from Tryon. Look for a small alleyway with the luce sign at the end of it. Wide pasta selection, gnocchi has good flavor and consistency without being too dense.
Authentic Italian! It was the first restaurant I visited after I moved to Charlotte. Food and service were amazing!
Excellent cuisine top seafood establishment
Service was #1 and the salmon was on point

The food was very good. Unfortunately the service was a bit off. The server never told us the specials, but we heard him telling other tables after we ordered. It also took quite a while to get our drinks. The calimari portion seemed small …
great place for a nice dinner
Magnificent! The quality of full dinning experience has no comparison in Charlotte. Bravo!
Good food at a good value, great atmosphere

Without question the best Italian I've been to in the States. The three of us shared several appetizers and mains, and everything we had was amazing. Very authentic high end Italian food, with great service and a good wine list (of which our servers were very knowledgeable too). Cannot recommend this place enough!
Great bread and bean oil while waiting for food. Always good service a great food.
perfect
Great décor, good location, excellent food and wonderful service. Recommend sandwich place, don't get the calamari as a app though.

I went for a nice corporate dinner; with my co-workers and myself include to this Italian restaurant. We started the night with a few appetizers with the taste was not that good.  Bruschetta: a grilled baguette with sweet tomatoes, some …
Service and food are both phenomenal
Great upscale ambience with delicious food!! A tad pricey for the portions, but the portions are well sized, so ladies bring your man, and men bring your wallets 😝
One of the best salmon meal I've had in a long time. It was fresh, well seasoned and the side dish was incredible.
We went during restaurant week. The appetizers and desserts were great. However, the entree had an odd resemblance to hamburger helper, which you don't expect when paying for fine dining.
Delicious.
Service was delightful and exquisite.  The food was beyond perfect!
Delicious food coupled with great service. A good choice for a good experience!

Did not honor my reservation. After waiting for 45 minutes past my reservation, I asked about the delay, and they told me that if I couldn't wait, and agree with the way they did business, then I was free to leave and eat elsewhere. The …

Uffffff.  Amazing.   It is not on the menu but ask for the Crudo de Pesce.  (Raw fish).  I wish the plate and my stomach was bigger!!!   ....and that was just for starters.   Oh yea,  get the Bellini to start off the night.
Very good Italian! One of the best homemade pasta dishes I've had!
Service is spot on and the food is nothing short of excellent. The ambiance is a bit "old world" for my tastes. Would definately dine again.
Luce is a small restaurant in downtown Charlotte. Delicious tapas and seafood paella.

This is the best italian restaurant I have been in the entire USA. The owner is truly italian, so the dishes are really authentic. One big proof of that is the lasagna: it has no ricotta cheese, the food is not overloaded with garlic. …

Everything from the food to the service was phenominal. The manager Manuel went above and beyond to make sure our dining experience was more than perfect.  After dinner the owner invited us to have a drink with him and his staff.  We ended …
